name: interactively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is designed to involve the user in the exchange of information: The program lets you work through a text interactively. Players go online simultaneously and play interactively in a virtual world.
in a way that involves communication between people: The audience are involved interactively in helping contestants get through each of the stages of the competition. From our first effort to work interactively, we encountered disagreement. See
interactive
More examplesFewer examplesPeople will be able to use their mobile phones to play the lottery interactively.The value can be changed interactively by the user.The tool lets you share pictures interactively with other subscribers in a text-chat environment.
